text: I'm Matt wold at the New York Times it's
been almost three months since the
accident at fukushima and every day we
have more news but it seems to
contradict the news that we had the day
before we'll be holding a live webcast
to talk about what we know what we don't
know and why there's all this
uncertainty about what happened and
conditions in the plant now we'll also
talk about the radiation in the
immediate area and the tough decisions
that the Japanese will face will be
joined by ken belson who spent most of
March and April in Tokyo he'll talk
about what it was like there and we'll
talk about what's ahead for the nuclear
industry in Japan in the United States
and worldwide come join us at the New
York Times knowledge Network
you
